abstract: Russian swimming champion Yulia Efimova tests positive for meldonium but still aims to compete in Summer Olympics.
snippet: The world swimming champion Yulia Efimova of Russia failed a doping test for meldonium but said she still hoped to compete at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics in August.
lead_paragraph: The world swimming champion Yulia Efimova of Russia failed a doping test for meldonium but said she still hoped to compete at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics in August.
